text: Ceradenia is a genus of ferns in the family Polypodiaceae, subfamily Grammitidoideae, according to the Pteridophyte Phylogeny Group classification of 2016 (PPG I). ==Species== , the Checklist of Ferns and Lycophytes of the World accepted the following species: *Ceradenia albidula (Baker) L.E.Bishop *Ceradenia alboglandulosa (Bonap.) Parris *Ceradenia argyrata (Bory ex Willd.) Parris *Ceradenia arthrothrix L.E.Bishop & A.R.Sm. *Ceradenia asthenophylla L.E.Bishop ex A.R.Sm. *Ceradenia aulaeifolia L.E.Bishop ex A.R.Sm. *Ceradenia auroseiomena L.E.Bishop *Ceradenia ayopayana M.Kessler & A.R.Sm. *Ceradenia bishopii (Stolze) A.R.Sm. *Ceradenia brunneoviridis (Baker ex Jenman) L.E.Bishop *Ceradenia capillaris (Desv.)
